full_summary:
# 12 Passenger Landing Craft Park Canada-B
## Bid Solicitation Notice
We have cancelled and superseded the previous bid solicitation titled 12 Passenger Landing Craft due to a technical issue with the original posting.

### Project Overview
Parks Canada requires a Landing Craft with the primary purpose of transporting staff between Nain, Labrador and Torngat Mountains National Park. The Landing Craft will also provide ferry services within the park.

### Key Requirements
* The Landing Craft shall be capable of transporting passengers and staff between Nain and Torngat Mountains National Park, returning in August.
* The Landing Craft will be required to navigate the Atlantic Ocean off the coast of Labrador to reach the National Park.
* The vessel shall be equipped with a landing craft ramp to enable passengers to embark and disembark securely.

### Contract Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3849514648
* Amendment Number: 1
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Contract Category: GD
* Value: Not disclosed

### Eligibility and Requirements
* The bid solicitation is open to all interested parties.
* Respondents must provide a detailed proposal outlining their submission in accordance with the bid solicitation documentation.

### Notice Details
* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15800797?extsite=MTU4MDA3OTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information:
	+ Dalton, Colleen
	+ mails: colleen.dalton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: Not disclosed
	+ Fax: Not disclosed
* Closing Date: June 7, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Additional Information
Please note that this bid solicitation cancels and supersedes the original bid solicitation titled 12 Passenger Landing Craft Parks Canada due to a technical issue. Respondents should carefully review the bid solicitation documentation and ensure their submission meets the requirements outlined in the new documentation.

We look forward to receiving your submission. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact the Contracting Authority. [Your Company Name] is committed to conducting the procurement process fairly and transparently. We will address all concerns and queries promptly and professionally. Please stay tuned for further updates and notifications.

\#governmenttender #parksCanada #landingcraft
